name: Eric Mcgovern
description: I’m a honest, caring and easygoing man with a good sense of humor I’m a widower with a grown up son that lives elsewhere, I love going on adventure, sight seeing, camping, watching and playing sports, swimming, reading etc I live alone comfortably in my own house with my 2 cars and 2 dogs, I love pets so much I have a very good and promising job career which I cherish so much My favorite color blue and I enjoy mostly sea foods I’m new into this online dating to see if I could find love again, a caring and honest woman who’s ready for a serious relationship with commitment. I’m also ready and willing to relocate for that special woman if need be.
